selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: To perform numeric calculations needed to determine the length of AC using the midpoint property.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to calculate the length of AC by doubling the length of segment AD (or DC) since D is the midpoint.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer in the required format.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the selected multiple-choice option as the final answer.

new_skill_specs.name: interpret_diagram
new_skill_specs.purpose: To interpret the geometric diagram and extract relevant information about the positions and relationships of points A, B, C, and D.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A dictionary containing the interpreted geometric relationships and segment lengths.
edge_cases: Diagram is unclear or labels are ambiguous
Additional markings in the diagram that are not mentioned in the text

tests.expect: {"AC": "2 * AD", "D is midpoint of AC": true}
